Header: Only economic development,not sufficient â€“ PM
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe says that mere economic development will not result a developed country. The Premier was speaking at a function held at Temple Trees today. The event was organized to pay compensation to the victims of political revenge and violent activities at the Digana area in Kandy. Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe stressed that it needs to create a civilized society on par with economic advancement. Addressing the gathering, Minister KabirHasheem said that though several attempts were made to compensate political victims the endeavor did not become a reality due to various obstacles. Minister AkilaVirajKariyawasam also spoke in the event. The function was attended by Ministers VajiraAbeywardena, RanjithMaddumabandara and Parliamentarian Palitha Range Bandara.
